summary_detail.value: The Western Montana Incident Management Team will be hosting a public meeting to discuss the current status and outlook for the fires near Plains, Thompson Falls, and Trout Creek. Fire managers, Sheriff Officers, and Forest Service representatives will be there to answer questions. Please share with all interested parties. For more information, contact the Public Information Officers at (406) 219-1960 or hwy200complex@gmail.com.

title: Public Meeting, Today, 1 PM, Plains High School (Highway 200 Complex Wildfire)
